NHAI/ commercial opertionsf74 dated 19.04.2006. As you may be aware, at present three types of system are prevalent at different Plazas for providing receipt t0 road users. These are: Manually issued tickets krom pre-printed booklets, without use of Printers. (ji) Pre-printed tickets issued with the use of Dot-matrix Printer (jii) Tickets issued with the use of Thermal Frinters using Paper rolls  In addition to above three systems, it has been decided to introduce new system of semi pre- printed tickets &s: (iv) Customized tickets wherein blank paper sheets of size 3x5" (lke bundle of currency notes) pre-printed from backside are used, At present; system at S.No i) to (iii) are in practice at most of the Flazas depending upon the availability of computer hardware software, Only in case of emergency and in case of new Plaza where computers] printers are not available; tickets will be issued as per system at S.No(i) The issuance of tickets with new system at S No (iv) is to be taken up where new Laser Printers are used Accordingly PDs concemed should arrange the Printing of customized tickets, wherein blank paper sheets of size 3x5" (not paper rolls); pre-printed from backside with the information about the plaza and rates etc will be used The tickets should be pre-numbered at back side s0 as t their inventory at different stages as was being done in case of manual tickets and Pre-printed tickets issued with the use of Dot-matrix Printer: The specimen format of the ticket is enclosed as Annexure-A for reference This issue with the approval of Competent Authority.
